thread.title: Great Location and hotel
thread.title_full: Great Location and hotel - Review of Hilton Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: pschedar
title: Great Location and hotel
text: We had a lovely stay. Every time we got back to the room the fairies had folded toilet paper into a beautiful triangle. We found a candy with some chocolates upon our return from New Year's Eve celebrations. The bed was so comfortable we had a nap every day. The sheets were as white as snow and so soft I can't even think of a comparison for it. There were so many pillows on the bed that we had to get rid of some. We would definitely stay again
